content:
Thank you for the clarification. Vitaminas is a well-known Portuguese restaurant chain that offers healthy and nutritious food options. The first Vitaminas restaurant was opened in Lisbon in 2004, and since then, the chain has expanded to multiple locations throughout Portugal, including in Porto, Cascais, and Almada.

The menu at Vitaminas features a range of healthy and tasty options, including salads, wraps, smoothie bowls, and fresh juices. They also offer vegetarian and vegan options. Vitaminas prides itself on using high-quality and fresh ingredients and avoiding processed foods and added sugars. The chain is popular with health-conscious diners who want to eat well while on-the-go.

In addition to their restaurants, Vitaminas also offers a meal delivery service, where customers can order healthy and nutritious meals online and have them delivered to their homes or offices.
